p: Moreover, flavonoids and saponin have been detected at various percentages in the PE. Flavonoids (Isovitexin, 2′-Hydroxy-2,4,4′,5-tetramethoxychalcone, Quercetin 3′-methyl ether and 7,3′,4′,5′-Tetramethoxyflavanone, Apigenin 8-C-glucoside) antimicrobial efficacy is due to inhibition of nucleic acid synthesis and alteration of cytoplasmic membrane function [ 42]. Whereas, saponin (Squalene, Kaur-16-ene) causes leakage of proteins and certain enzymes from the bacterial cells [ 43].
